qa.name: Coral
qa.appearance: Shimmering blue tail, long flowing hair

tr.name: Captain Redbeard
tr.clothing: Striped shirt, tattered pants, red bandana

json_to_edit.voice_over: The surface world called to Coral, a siren song of mystery and wonder.
json_to_edit.description: A mermaid's curiosity leads her to discover the world above the waves.
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Waves crashing, seagulls calling, wind rustling
json_to_edit.name: Ocean Meets Land
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Coral, a mermaid, ventures to the surface world with her friend Bubbles and encounters Captain Redbeard.

qa.action: Coral swims through a vibrant coral reef, looking up towards the shimmering surface.

hf.action: Coral's eyes widen with curiosity as she gazes upward.

tr.action: Bubbles the pufferfish nervously follows Coral as she swims upwards.

xc.action: Coral's head breaks the surface, she takes her first breath of air.

ka.action: A beautiful beach comes into view, with Captain Redbeard's ship anchored nearby.

fn.action: Captain Redbeard stands on the deck of his ship, spotting something in the water.

af.action: Coral's amazed expression as she sees the ship and the captain.

qo.action: Bubbles hides behind a rock, watching Coral's interaction from below.

fp.action: Captain Redbeard lowers a rope ladder, inviting Coral to climb aboard.

va.action: Coral sits on the ship's railing, tail glistening in the sun, as Captain Redbeard shows her a map of the world.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene

bm.sfx_keywords: water surface tension, gentle waves, seagulls
bm.action: The screen is divided: underwater showing Coral's tail and marine life, above water showing her upper body, the sky, and distant shore.

label.rationale: we can add one more shot to the scene to enhance the storytelling and provide a fuller experience of coral's adventure. let's add a shot that shows the contrast between the underwater world and the surface world, emphasizing coral's transition. this new shot will be placed between the existing shots "xc" (coral breaking the surface) and "ka" (the wide-shot of the beach). we'll create a new shot with a random two-letter key "bm" and update the list_display_order accordingly.
